subject: Re: [junit] Run same test method with different data
msgSnippet: ... You appear to want to create a Parameterized Test Case. Search the archives of this group for more information. Also, consider using FitNesse
messageBody:
Jacqueline Guerrero wrote:
> Is there a way to run a testXXX() method with the same set-up and
> tear-down but with different data?

You appear to want to create a Parameterized Test Case. Search the
archives of this group for more information.

Also, consider using FitNesse (http://fitnesse.org) for heavily
data-driven testing.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
